website_summaries.verdict: Extremely low price for a pair of tires, but they won’t be as durable as some others.
pros: Good for use off road, as the tires have a four-ply design that resists punctures on rough roads
Aggressive tread pattern allows the tires to throw off mud on soft ground
It’s tough to beat the price for these two tires
cons: Wheels are a bit small, so they won’t work on large bikes

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price IF you can install them yourself.
customer_reviews.text: If you have the tools/time to install these yourself, they're awesome. However, after having to pay a local bike shop to install these on my son's wheels, I could have bought a set of tires from them. They would have been more expensive, but the mounting charge wouldn't bit my wallet. Other than that, the tires seem to be holding up great with my son racing.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua N.

customer_reviews.title: I Really Like These Tires!
customer_reviews.text: These tires seem to be of great quality. I ordered them for my 2009 Yamaha TTR110. They were an exact fit with a much more aggressive look and feel. These tires provided a lot more traction in the dirt. I will definitely purchase these tires again in the future for any of my 12/14 size tire pit bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Jorden

customer_reviews.title: Fits KX60's
customer_reviews.text: Great price, only complaint is rear is not as wide as others. Size is 80/100 but seems skinner just a tad. Hook up is great.....These were $58 7-19
customer_reviews.author: tnt

customer_reviews.title: Bad to the bone tires but shippings took way too long
customer_reviews.text: These are some awesome tires they are a pain to put on like all new tires but they are solid and built hard and grippy! The only thing is shipping took like 2 weeks that's lame put prime shipping and you'll be out of stock before you know it
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Great lookin tires. My son says they ride smooth too!
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great tires for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, true to size, free from defects. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Klrsmile

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this package price deal for me he every day user. Much more aggressive than stock but still a manageable design to work with. With free shipping these can be had for under $50/set!!!
customer_reviews.author: M Creighton

customer_reviews.title: A steal of a deal
customer_reviews.text: Grip nice rip it up on the pw 80 as far as value or bang for the buck u can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Tires look good
customer_reviews.text: Good looking tires hard to get on probably the case for most tires though
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Poore

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good tires for the money. Good grip and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal with a amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Really good tread also for a up grade on a pw 80 stock tire a amazing difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Shermer

product_meta.title: Protrax Offroad Front 60/100-14 Inch & Rear 80/100-12 Inch Tire Combo
product_meta.description:
ProTrax Tough Gear is designed for soft/Intermediate terrain.Tires are designed to balance between maximizing traction and maintaining durability on your mini or mid-size dirt bike. The stiff 4 ply construction resists punctures and the knob spacing lessons the build up of mud. This is a kit that contains one 14 inch front and one 12 inch rear tire.



Compatible with:

HONDA CR60R 1983-1984 
HONDA CRF110F 2013-2017 
HONDA CRF70F 2004-2012 
HONDA XR70R 1997-2003 
KAWASAKI KLX110 2003-2017 
KAWASAKI KLX110L 2010-2017 
KAWASAKI KX60 1983-2003 
KAWASAKI KX65 2000-2017 
KTM 60 SX 1998-2000 
KTM 65 SX 1998-2017 
KTM 65 SXS 2013-2013 
KTM 65 XC 2008-2009 
SUZUKI DR-Z110 2003-2005 
SUZUKI RM50 1978-1980 
SUZUKI RM60 1979-1983 
SUZUKI RM60 2003-2003 
SUZUKI RM65 2003-2005 
YAMAHA PW80 1983-2006 
YAMAHA TTR110E 2008-2017 
YAMAHA TTR90 2000-2004 
YAMAHA TTR90E 2003-2006 
YAMAHA YZ50 1980-1980 
YAMAHA YZ60 1981-1983
feature_bullets: ✅ If you are looking for performance, durability, and value in a tire then Protrax is for you!
✅ ProTrax Front 60/100-14 Inch & Rear 80/100-12 Inch Tire Combo
